name: Pitch Deck Template by Kasra Khalili
description:
After raising money for my own startup, I know just how hard the fundraising process can be. Aside from the meetings, emails, and due diligence, so much time and effort is spent on one thing: the pitch deck.

I built this pitch deck from my own experiences of what investors like to see, as well as, taking notes from some prominent accelerator groups like YC and 500 Startups. The goal was to keep the slides as simple as possible while still ensuring that those you share this with can grasp the value of your startup's mission.


Save valuable time and money by using this predesigned Figma Pitch Deck Template and spend more of your energy building your dream startup.


What you'll get:

  • 15 designed slides
  • 1 icon set
  • Fully editable elements & fonts
  • Change colors in just a few clicks
  • Apple Macbook & IPhone Mockups
  • Ability to download to PDF


If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to me at kasra@hey.com.
